title: Student Council Leadership Election 2025
description: Annual election for student council leadership positions

candidates.name: Gervin Dela Cueva
candidates.bio: 4th year Computer Science student with strong leadership experience in various student organizations and technology clubs.
candidates.goals: Enhance student services through technology integration, improve campus Wi-Fi infrastructure, and create more opportunities for student-industry partnerships.

candidates.name: Jericho Galace
candidates.bio: 3rd year Business Administration student passionate about student welfare and campus community building.
candidates.goals: Improve campus dining options, establish better mental health support programs, and create more recreational facilities for students.
